APP.TITLE: Strike 2024 Museum
APP.SUBTITLE: Preserving the art, voices, and memory of the July-August 2024 Bangladesh student protests

HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE: Preserving the art, voices, and memory of the July-August 2024 Bangladesh student protests.
HOME.DOCUMENTING_TEXT: The July-August 2024 Bangladesh strikes marked a turning point in the nation's history. This digital museum preserves the artistic expressions, personal testimonies, and documentary evidence of this powerful student-led movement.
HOME.WITNESS_TEXT: Explore the complete timeline of events, hear from those who were there, and see the art that emerged from this pivotal moment in Bangladesh's history.

FOOTER.MISSION: Preserving the history and art of the July-August 2024 Bangladesh student protests.
FOOTER.ABOUT_TEXT: This digital museum is dedicated to preserving the memory and documentation of the 2024 Bangladesh student protests.
